flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Panjos are built out of breadpans, wood, screws, cork and fishing line. You can easily build and play a panjo.
guide.introduction_rendered: Panjos are built out of breadpans, wood, screws, cork and fishing line. You can easily build and play a panjo.
guide.summary: The panjo is an stringed instrument made out of easy-to-get materials.
guide.title: Panjo
